resources.string: Location permission required for bluetooth (this app can\'t do anything without bluetooth)
Connect device to earpiece via Bluetooth
Bluetooth requires location permission, please grant in system settings
App needs camera access to scan QR codes, please grant or use keyboard flow instead
Use camera to scan QR code
QR code scanning requires camera permission, please grant in system settings
App needs microphone to record Voice Memos
Use microphone to record Voice Memos
Recording audio requires microphone permission, please grant in system settings
